errorBoundary.restoreMessage: Please click on the link to restore the session:
errorBoundary.resetMessage: Please click on the link to reset the session:

Constrained.title: Constrained
Constrained.description: The EF 2016 report considers a case where no new major oil pipelines are built over the projection period to address uncertainties related to future oil export infrastructure.

Evolving.title: Evolving
Evolving.description: This is a placeholder of the Evolving tooltip text

High LNG.title: High LNG
High LNG.description: The uncertainty related to eventual volumes of liquefied natural gas (LNG) exports is explored in two additional cases.

High Price.title: High Price
High Price.description: A price case with higher oil and natural gas prices captures some of the uncertainty related to future energy prices.

Higher Carbon Price.title: High CO2 Price
Higher Carbon Price.description: The Higher Carbon Price Case explores the impact of higher carbon pricing than in the Reference Case in the longer term.

Low Price.title: Low Price
Low Price.description: A price case with lower oil and natural gas prices captures some of the uncertainty related to future energy prices.

No LNG.title: No LNG
No LNG.description: The uncertainty related to eventual volumes of liquefied natural gas (LNG) exports is explored in two additional cases.

Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: The Reference Case provides a baseline outlook with a moderate view of energy prices and economic growth, and climate and energy policies announced at the time of analysis.

Technology.title: Technology
Technology.description: The Technology Case considers higher carbon prices than the Reference Case and greater adoption of select emerging production and consumption energy technologies.
